name: Sniper Shooting: Thrilling Mis
description:
Sniper Shooting: Thrilling Missions Army is specially designed for those gamers who willing to play top fps thrilling action game with challenging missions in special sniper war to show commando skills. In modern assassin sniper game, get ready to pull the trigger and eliminate the terrorists from the territory.
Features:
- Exciting map with realistic combat environment
- HD graphics & epic game story
- Amazing Fighting Effects
- Motivational background music and sound effects
- Immersive game objectives with unique tasks
- Advance armoire of powerful weapons
- Smooth and easy to handle control
